titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Wednesday the 25th day of April, 1694
Speeches. 1694-04-25.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd; printers to the King and Qu[e]ens most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Expressing gratitude to Parliament for its support, and proroguing the Parliament until the eighteenth day of the following September.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd;
